EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-04-28-Kentucky Derby Raffle Final Send.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: Last Chance | We Want to Send you to the Kentucky Derby!
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/XRDTN8K?marketo_zs00ja7e8g=[marketo_zs00ja7e8g_value]&marketo_ff0s7l5qls=[marketo_ff0s7l5qls_value]&marketo_olh86f3r9s=[marketo_olh86f3r9s_value]&marketo_day0sfb59s=[marketo_day0sfb59s_value]&marketo_qqebotxyuo=[marketo_qqebotxyuo_value]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, At Turbonomic we understand that vendor meetings can sometimes take away from time that could be spent with friends and family. Our mission is to give that time back to you, before you even consider becoming a Turbonomic customer. This is why we want to take a step back, let you know that we understand your time is extremely valuable and extend an offer that will give you time back for any time spent with us. This is the last chance to sign up for a meeting with our engineers for a $100 Amazon Gift Card and an entry into our raffle for Kentucky Derby Tickets. Simply take a few minutes to fill out our 143rd Kentucky Derby Turbonomic Giveaway <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/XRDTN8K?marketo_zs00ja7e8g=[marketo_zs00ja7e8g_value]&marketo_ff0s7l5qls=[marketo_ff0s7l5qls_value]&marketo_olh86f3r9s=[marketo_olh86f3r9s_value]&marketo_day0sfb59s=[marketo_day0sfb59s_value]&marketo_qqebotxyuo=[marketo_qqebotxyuo_value]]]>, and meet with one of our Turbonomic Engineers to be entered into the giveaway. One Grand Prize winner will receive a pair of Reserved Seating Tickets, and 3 lucky winners will receive a pair of General Admission Tickets for the Kentucky Oaks & Kentucky Derby on Friday, May 5th, 2017, and Saturday May 6th, 2017. <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/XRDTN8K?marketo_zs00ja7e8g=[marketo_zs00ja7e8g_value]&marketo_ff0s7l5qls=[marketo_ff0s7l5qls_value]&marketo_olh86f3r9s=[marketo_olh86f3r9s_value]&marketo_day0sfb59s=[marketo_day0sfb59s_value]&marketo_qqebotxyuo=[marketo_qqebotxyuo_value]]]> The Giveaway ends today, so this is your last opportunity for a chance to win! Good luck! -The Turbonomic Team
